channel.title: Question in the bonus area
channel.description:
wow i fell kinda noobie postinhere i havent done it in a while...
anyways,
i was looking at the bonuses and is there any way to make it say only
attack:(slash bonus) defence:(range def bonus) strength:(thebonus) range:(range def bonus) or just hide the other bonuses?

item.title: Question in the bonus area
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

i belive thats client sided, has something 2 do with its interface lol, i guessing u wuld have 2 make a whole new interface

Read full topic
